chat.storage module¶

class chat.storage.Storage(session)[source]¶

Bases: object

Storage class provides the API to the storage.

auth_user(user, password)[source]¶

Authenticate user. Uses ~python.hashlib.pbkdf2_hmac

Parameters

  • user – user name

  • password – user password
